column5: Mixed decor with mostly leather and wooden furniture. Warm colors are used throughout the house. Master and loft bed have memory foam mattresses. Walking distance to marina and very reasonable boat rental prices. Restaurant at marina and another behind the house on the main thoroughfare. Several other local bars and restaurants within a few miles with great live music on the weekends. Moonshine bar near the neighborhood main entrance.
column8: Cozy Ranch Style Cottage walk to Lake Travis.
